name: Haunted Things
description:
Haunted Things - is an indie horror game that you can choose as third person or first person to be comfortable in carrying out survival horror actions. Play as Guna, looking for his brother who mysteriously disappeared. On his journey, he is haunted by bad things from other worlds and even from his own world.

With his background as a police officer, Guna has to leave his job to look for his brother who mysteriously disappeared. He has to face various threats, from ghosts, demons, to rebel soldiers.

Gameplay

You have to look for various clues at Guna's brother's house and continue your journey to find his brother.

Features




  • Experience the atmosphere of the game.
  • Battle against terrifying beings from a supernatural realm.
  • Battle against rebel soldiers.
  • Use weapons to banish them all.
  • Solve mysteriuos puzzles that block your path.
  • Switch between first person and third person view.
